document_data.mainbody:
Jembril Street was a small road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Jembril Street was located in the south section of Waterdeeps Trades Ward. The road originated on Shoor Street where it branched north into a neighborhood, intersecting Lathins Cut before coming to a dead end.
A city building called the Plinth sat on the northwest corner of Lathins Cut and Jembril Street.
